meanings.sent1: The church picnic will be held interparish, at the border of two parishes.
meanings.sent2: The road construction project spans interparish boundaries.
meanings.sent3: The bake sale was so successful that it became an interparish event.
meanings.sent4: The friendship between the two parishes was like an interparish bridge connecting communities.
meanings.sent5: The interparish agreement allowed both parishes to share resources effectively.

meanings.definition: Relating to the interaction between parishes.
meanings.sent1: The interparish council meeting discussed joint community projects.
meanings.sent2: The interparish relationship strengthened bonds between neighboring parishes.
meanings.sent3: The interparish soccer match ended in a tie, much to everyone's amusement.
meanings.sent4: The interparish collaboration was a shining example of unity in diversity.
meanings.sent5: The interparish choir performance showcased the harmonious blend of voices from different parishes.
